sourcesContent:
/** * Page Not Found component * Displayed when a route doesn't match any defined routes */ import { Component } from '@angular/core'; /** * Page Not Found component * 404 error page */ @Component({ selector: 'app-page-not-found', templateUrl: './page-not-found.component.html', styleUrls: ['./page-not-found.component.scss'] }) export class PageNotFoundComponent {}
404

Page Not Found

The page you are looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.
